content.rendered:
Street Style 80s Trend

The street style ’80 trend keeps picking up speed. Yes, we still have the ’70 and the ’90s trends still popular, but I’m starting to see more and more ’80s trends on runways and in designer collections.

I recommend mixing & matching as well as playing around with different colors. The 1980s was such a happy/fun time when it came to fashion and pop culture. I’m excited to incorporate this trend!

Click on the designer and store names to shop. The Look 1 is from FWRD.com as well as look #2. I always love how they style their looks with different designers…not just showcasing one item.

Both earrings are from Zara.com at a very nice price around $25. Blogger favorite Balenciaga sneakers are selling like hotcakes! Hello comfort and style! Large Fendi bag is from Saks.com Yellow Pumps by Gianvito Rossi

LOVE DIONNE
